April.title: HackTrix
April.notes: The art of invention and creation is one that must be honed through practice and application. To test the limits of your creativity and innovation, IEEE SRM SB introduces HackTrix, A hackathon-like-no-other packed with learning opportunities, networking, and getting mentored by some of the most experienced individuals in the realm. Sign up for a 3-day development spree from 2nd April 2021 to 4th April 2021 to showcase your revolutionary talents with 8-unique tracks that transform your field and lead you to the top. In a pool of like-minded individuals, innovate, create something extraordinary and bag yourself amazing prizes. If you think the innovator in you is intrigued, go check us out and register for HackTrix now!

April.title: Xylem Global Student Innovation Challenge 2021
